name: mndsssgrp

stmt.origin: mp2an(wpss(cmnd, csgrp), wss(cmnd, csgrp), wrex(hs0, csgrp, wnel(cv(hs0), cmnd)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(Mnd ⊊ SGrp, Mnd ⊆ SGrp, ∃(hs0 ∈ SGrp, hs0 ∉ Mnd))

body.origin:
|- wpss(cmnd, csgrp)
-| wss(cmnd, csgrp)
-| wrex(hs0, csgrp, wnel(cv(hs0), cmnd))
-| wi(wa(wss(cmnd, csgrp), wrex(hs0, csgrp, wnel(cv(hs0), cmnd))), wpss(cmnd, csgrp))
body.pretty:
⊢ Mnd ⊊ SGrp
⊣ Mnd ⊆ SGrp
⊣ ∃(hs0 ∈ SGrp, hs0 ∉ Mnd)
⊣ ((Mnd ⊆ SGrp ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ SGrp, hs0 ∉ Mnd))→ Mnd ⊊ SGrp)

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Mnd ⊊ SGrp

⊣ ((Mnd ⊆ SGrp ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ SGrp, hs0 ∉ Mnd))→ Mnd ⊊ SGrp)

body.origin:
|- wss(cmnd, csgrp)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), csgrp))
-| diffsc(hs0, cmnd)
-| diffsc(hs0, csgrp)
body.pretty:
⊢ Mnd ⊆ SGrp
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Mnd → hs0 ∈ SGrp)
⊣ d(hs0, Mnd)
⊣ d(hs0, SGrp)
